name: Grenade Launcher
description:
This  is a really bad 2 player game.

Player 1 plays as grenade launcher,

Player 2 plays as the weird red creature.

Point system:

When a grenade hits red creature, grenade launcher gets 1 point.

When the red creature doesn't take damage for 5 seconds, it gets 1 point.

This game is pretty bad so it might get updates
